storyMissions.name: Set Up Shop
storyMissions.description: Business foundation complete: website live, pitch materials ready, service packages defined, ROI calculator working

storyMissions.name: First Contact
storyMissions.description: Reach out to first 10 property managers (calls, emails, or in-person)

storyMissions.name: Sit Down
storyMissions.description: Land first meeting/presentation with a decision maker at an apartment complex

storyMissions.name: Opening Night
storyMissions.description: Complete first week of service at first property

storyMissions.name: Made
storyMissions.description: Sign second contract (prove it wasn't a fluke)

storyMissions.name: The Family
storyMissions.description: First franchise inquiry or expansion to second market area

weeklyMissions.name: Pipeline Foundation
weeklyMissions.description: Identify and research 10 local apartment complexes for outreach
